item.description:
CLASS IS BY INVITATION TO LEVEL II STEPPERS ONLY, PLEASE CONFIRM YOUR "RSVP" TO SECURE YOUR SPOT.

CLASS WILL BE HELD BY SARAH TEAGLE
CLASS WILL BE HELD FROM 2 TO 4 P.M.
CLASS SIZE IS LIMITED
COST $30
$10 AIRLINE TICKET
$20 CLASS

INVITATION IS EXTENDED TO STEPPERS ON THE "RSVP LIST" ONLY
IF YOU DO NOT PLAN ON PARTICIPATING, PLEASE REMOVE YOUR NAME FROM THE RSVP LIST
THE RSVP LIST WILL BE UPDATED JAN 2, IF YOU HAVE NOT RESPONDED OR PAID $10 deposit YOUR NAME WILL BE REMOVED FROM THE RSVP LIST
JAN 3 LIST WILL CONTAIN NAMES OF STEPPERS WHO ARE CONFIRMED FOR CLASS


INVITATION WILL BE EXTENDED TO STEPPERS CONFIRMED AND WHO HAVE PAID DEPOSIT FOR LEVEL I PROVIDED SPACE IS AVAILABLE
THEREFORE: 2 CLASSES AND AIRLINE FEE $60

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin Up Your Game Level II Invitational Only
